verses.name: Jonah 1:14
verses.text: Wherefore they cried unto the Lord, and said, We beseech thee, O Lord, we beseech thee, let us not perish for this man’s life, and lay not upon us innocent blood: for thou, O Lord, hast done as it pleased thee.

verses.name: Jonah 1:15
verses.text: So they took up Jonah, and cast him forth into the sea: and the sea ceased from her raging.

verses.name: Jonah 1:16
verses.text: Then the men feared the Lord exceedingly, and offered a sacrifice unto the Lord, and made vows.
